room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Inlet" by Cipher Seeker Room Escape Challenge in New York
review: We played the Graveyard Inlet game. I liked how we were given clues via a computer monitor. It seemed less like getting "cheats" and more part of the game experience. Many of the puzzles were very clever. I would have liked to have a few more physical tasks to complete, but that won't keep me from coming back. I plan on trying the Framed game next month!

room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Inlet" by Cipher Seeker Room Escape Challenge in New York
review: We came for my fianc√©e's 32nd birthday with our families and one year old nephew. It was such a great bonding experience and so interesting to see how we all contributed to escaping the Graveyard Inlet! We all highly recommend and are already planning to go back and do a different room in the Fall!

room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Inlet" by Cipher Seeker Room Escape Challenge in New York
review: We had a blast! The graveyard inlet is a lot of fun and had the perfect amount of challenge! Would definitely go back to try the other rooms.
